content: **edit 3/13/25** for the very first time i have somehow run out of yarn while making one of these blankets at the same exact size as usual i did check my weight and it was correct so i m going to caution that you may need a third cake just in case ~ ~ ~ **edit ** i had a small issue with the youtube video link i have since updated the pdf so if you downloaded it previously and the link won t work please re-download the pdf thank you ~ ~ ~ this is my personal baby blanket pattern i ve used for several years now every incoming new baby that i know gets one usually before they re born the pictures are of the latest one i did for a very special little girl who s now arrived important notes * gauge is not super important as blanket is technically made to measure at 36 x 36 stroller size * i recommend a self-striping yarn use whatever you like * a video tutorial for c2c crochet is included in my pdf * you ll need between 1 5-2 cakes/skeins if you re using the yarn i used ready to get started grab your hook yarn and the pattern and let s go
